tool_description: Synthesizes speech with specific emotional characteristics including happiness, sadness, anger, surprise, and neutral states.

input_text.description: Text to be synthesized with emotion

emotion_type.description: Emotion: happy, sad, angry, surprised, neutral, excited, calm

error_messages: Invalid emotion type: Use happy, sad, angry, surprised, neutral, excited, or calm.
Emotion intensity out of range: Use values between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid voice profile: Voice profile not found or unsupported.
Unsupported language: Language code not supported for emotional synthesis.
Parameter out of range: speech_rate (0.5-2.0), pitch_variation (0.5-2.0), volume_dynamics (0.1-2.0).
Text too long: Input text exceeds maximum length for emotional synthesis.
Synthesis failed: Emotional speech generation encountered technical issues.
usage: Provide text, emotion type, intensity, voice profile, and language code. Optionally adjust speech rate, pitch variation, and other emotional parameters for expressive synthesis.

output_audio_path.description: Path to emotionally synthesized audio file

synthesis_duration.description: Duration of generated audio in seconds
